attributes.action: Reconsider introducing noise level restraints at concerts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Noise level restraints at concerts would effectively put a ban on live music in pubs and clubs throughout Britain.Amongst others this would have serious implications by killing off a vital part of the UK music industry and impinge on the UK citizen's right of choice to listen to live music.

rejection.details: There is no such policy or proposal.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
